mapper.insert: insert into project_staff (project_id, staff_id, is_signed, enter_date, quit_date, salary, status, remark, is_settled, quit_reason, staff_name) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSigned,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{quitDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{salary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSettled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quitReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update project_staff set is_signed = #{isSigned,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_date = #{enterDate,jdbcType=DATE}, quit_date = #{quitDate,jdbcType=DATE}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_settled = #{isSettled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quit_reason = #{quitReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select project_id, staff_id, is_signed, enter_date, quit_date, salary, status, remark, is_settled, quit_reason, staff_name from project_staff
